name: OSIRIS (itch) (SOYBABY)
description:
Based on Egyptian mythology, you play as Queen ISIS, goddess of magic on an urgent mission to rescue her husband King OSIRIS from a tragic fate. 

Official submission to Global Game Jam 2021 via Playcrafting NYC!

Featuring: 

  • handcrafted retro 8-bit art style!
  • random generated hordes!
  • cute characters!
  • soar like magical human bird!
  • variable sonic powers!

HOW TO PLAY

Collect all the parts of Osiris while avoiding the evil hordes.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

UP = ascend
DOWN = descend, low scream
LEFT/RIGHT = glide, walk
SPACEBAR/RETURN = high scream

Compatible web browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Safari

@soybaby #OSIRISgame #GGJ21 #GGJOnline
